de.weltraumschaf.dht.cmd

Class BaseCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.dht.cmd.BaseCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command, Describable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bootstrap, Exit, Help, Inbox, Send, Start, Status, Stop

    abstract class BaseCommand
extends Object
implements Command
    Base implementation for commands.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
